title: "Sky-high Scenery"
content:
# Sky-high Scenery

Welcome to Sky-high Scenery, your destination for breathtaking mountain views. Our website features a stunning wallpaper of a mountain range against a clear blue sky that will transport you to the great outdoors.

At Sky-high Scenery, we believe in the power of nature to inspire and rejuvenate. That's why we've curated a collection of beautiful landscapes from around the world, all available as high-quality wallpapers for your desktop or mobile device.

Whether you're looking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life or simply want to bring a touch of natural beauty into your daily routine, Sky-high Scenery has something for everyone. So why not explore our collection today and discover the wonders of the great outdoors?

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A mountain range with a clear blue sky"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
